医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
麦卢卡蜂蜜与奥伊亚乐华蜂蜜：研究揭示了关键的抗氧化差异和健康益处研究比较了麦卢卡蜂蜜（MH）和奥伊亚乐华蜂蜜（OLH）的抗氧化特性，发现 MH 的酚类含量高出十倍，而 OLH 通过减少氧化应激和增强抗氧化能力而表现出卓越的体内抗氧化活性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250119/Manuka-vs-Ohia-Lehua-honey-Study-reveals-key-antioxidant-differences-and-health-benefits.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250119/Manuka-vs-Ohia-Lehua-honey-Study-reveals-key-antibiotic-differences-and-health-benefits.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8c093ca1-a03a-497b-be24-8512b8311f5c Sun, 19 Jan 2025 16:37:00 -0500 Manuka vs. Ohia Lehua honey: Study reveals key antioxidant differences and health benefits
随着治疗临床试验的开始，对罕见肝癌的新见解与许多罕见疾病一样，纤维板层性肝细胞癌（FLC）对少数不幸的人发起猛烈攻击——在本例中是儿童、青少年和年轻人。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250117/New-insights-into-rare-liver-cancer-as-clinical-trial-for-treatment-begins.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250117/New-insights-into-rare-liver-cancer-as-clinical-trial-for-treatment-begins.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3fd121ac-b3f2-4f06-9ebc-955fd4656208 Fri, 17 Jan 2025 16:26:00 -0500 New insights into rare liver cancer as clinical trial for treatment begins
干细胞疗法有望恢复中风后大脑活动美国每 40 秒就有一人中风。对于最常见的中风类型（称为缺血性中风）的幸存者来说，只有约 5% 的人能够完全康复。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250117/Stem-cell-therapy-shows-promise-in-restoring-brain-activity-after-中风.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250117/Stem-cell-therapy-shows-promise-in-restoring-brain-activity-after-中风.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c589e49e-0fdd-4619-bb81-35a6a45687f0 Fri, 17 Jan 2025 16:18:00 -0500 Stem cell therapy shows promise in restoring brain activity after stroke
研究揭示 NSP4 在轮状病毒疾病严重程度中的关键作用贝勒医学院和合作机构的研究人员提高了我们对轮状病毒（儿童急性胃肠炎最常见原因）如何致病的了解。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250117/Study-uncovers-key-role-of-NSP4-in-rotavirus-disease-severity.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250117/Study-uncovers-key-role-of-NSP4-in-rotavirus-disease-severity.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=426cee11-70b7-4002-b28c-2cebed25f39f Fri, 17 Jan 2025 16:09:00 -0500 Study uncovers key role of NSP4 in rotavirus disease severity
HIV疫苗反应的新发现揭示了令人惊讶的抗体行为许多疫苗通过向体内引入类似于病毒一部分的蛋白质来发挥作用。理想情况下，免疫系统将产生识别特定病毒的持久抗体，从而提供保护。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250117/New-discovery-in-HIV-vaccine-response-reveals-surprising-antibody-behavior.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250117/New-discovery-in-HIV-vaccine-response-reveals-surprising-antibody-behavior.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=fdb2b056-ff7e-4d48-9fcd-e6b914ede140 Fri, 17 Jan 2025 15:59:00 -0500 New discovery in HIV vaccine response reveals surprising antibody behavior
绘制神经元 IL-1R1 表达图谱揭示大脑功能白细胞介素-1 (IL-1) 是参与炎症的关键分子，在健康和疾病状态下都发挥着重要作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250117/Mapping-neuronal-IL-1R1-express-reveals-insights-into-brain-function.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250117/Mapping-neuronal-IL-1R1-express-reveals-insights-into-brain-function.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=938c6fd6-4980-4c61-841f-53757e4d86f7 Fri, 17 Jan 2025 15:51:00 -0500 Mapping neuronal IL-1R1 expression reveals insights into brain function
中性粒细胞弹性蛋白酶测试显示出预测早产的希望尼日利亚此前尚未开展过关于中性粒细胞弹性蛋白酶在预测早产中的作用的研究。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250117/Neutropil-elastase-test-shows-promise-in-predicting-preterm-birth.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250117/Neutropil-elastase-test-shows-promise-in-predicting-preterm-birth.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1db75549-0f61-476a-a5a2-2d69057f7905 Fri, 17 Jan 2025 15:43:00 -0500
怀孕早期体重增加导致胎儿脂肪分布过多美国国立卫生研究院研究人员的一项研究表明，在怀孕前三个月体重增加过多的孕妇的胎儿会出现上臂和腹部脂肪分布过多的迹象。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250117/Early-pregnancy-weight-gain-contributes-to-excess-fat-distribution-in-fetuses.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250117/Early-pregnancy-weight-gain-contributes-to-excess-fat-distribution-in-fetuses.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=25cf77a3-e717-4e01-952e-43c5002bf484 Fri, 17 Jan 2025 15:35:00 -0500 Early pregnancy weight gain contributes to excess fat distribution in fetuses
突破揭示了 DNA 和 RNA 表观遗传学如何共同控制基因我们的基因包含我们身体发挥功能所需的所有指令，但它们的表达必须受到精细调节，以保证每个细胞最佳地发挥其作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250117/Breakthrough-reveals-how-DNA-and-RNA-epigenics-work-together-to-control-genes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250117/Breakthrough-reveals-how-DNA-and-RNA-epigenics-work-together-to-control-genes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=816bb9d0-9b07-48a6-bb4e-6e59b3f779b7 Fri, 17 Jan 2025 15:28:00 -0500 Breakthrough reveals how DNA and RNA epigenetics work together to control genes
研究揭示镰状细胞病患者大脑老化患有镰状细胞病（一种慢性疾病，畸形的粘性血细胞聚集在一起，减少向器官输送氧气）的患者中风和由此导致的认知障碍的风险较高。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250117/Study-reveals-brain-aging-in-sickle-cell-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250117/Study-reveals-brain-aging-in-sickle-cell-病人.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8bcc0aaf-7bca-42c9-a64e-53e6b40d65d2 Fri, 17 Jan 2025 15:20:00 -0500 Study reveals brain aging in sickle cell patients
